name: @supacrawler/js
description: Typed TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Supacrawler API (scrape, jobs, screenshots, watch)
author: Supacrawler

scripts.example:scrape: npm run build && cd examples && node scrape.js
scripts.example:jobs: npm run build && cd examples && node jobs.js
scripts.example:screenshots: npm run build && cd examples && node screenshots.js
scripts.example:watch: npm run build && cd examples && node watch.js
